mapper.select:
select
from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_CUSTOM_TYPE WHERE (TYPE_RES_ID = 1 OR TYPE_RES_ID = 2) ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

select
from SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_CUSTOM_TYPE WHERE TYPE_RES_ID = 3 ORDER BY CREATE_DATE DESC

FROM SYS_SCENIC_SPOT_CUSTOM_TYPE WHERE TYPE_RES_ID = 3 AND TYPE_NAME_VALUE = #{typeNameValue}
